title: Dear all millennials: Is this true? lol

embed.description: From Lotto tickets to Big Macs, young people aren't buying a lot of things - or so we're told.

body:
I'm talking about that quote at 0:44 about millennials not knowing what fabric softener is for LMAO

http://fortune.com/2016/12/16/millennials-fabric-softener-downy/

I've been doing my own laundry since I was 10 years old so this is surprising to me lol
